release.action: Major refactor: - Now requires Java 8 minimum. - Logging now using SLF4j. - Simplified event handling. - Update library dependencies. - Now uses Java DateTime as opposed to Date. - Use Path everywhere instead of File. - Now backing up directory instead of individual files. - StopRequestMonitor now ShutdownHook. - Keep a history of duration (start/end pairs) for all start/resume occurrences. - Dropped mail-related listeners. - Dropped LogManager. - Now using List in favor of arrays.
